    • Method Detail

      • add

        public int add(Group group,
               Course course,
               Lesson lesson)
        Add lesson to the table lesson Auto-commit disabled default : all modifications are performed before commit
        Parameters:
        lesson - the lesson to add
        group - the group associate to this lesson
        course - the course associated to this lesson
        Returns:
        return the number of lines added to the table

      • update

        public int update(Group group,
                  Course course,
                  Lesson oldLesson,
                  Lesson newLesson)
        Edit a lesson in the table lesson. Auto-commit by default : each update is effective
        Parameters:
        lesson - the lesson to update
        course - the course associated to a this lesson
        oldLesson - the lesson with the previous information
        newLesson - the lesson with the new information
        Returns:
        return the number of lines updated in the table

      • delete

        public int delete(Lesson lesson)
        Delete a lesson from the table lesson. If the lesson is associated to a lesson, the deletion won't be done Auto-commit by default: each deletion is effective
        Parameters:
        lesson - the lesson to delete
        Returns:
        return the number of lines deleted from the table

      • get

        public Lesson get(int id)
        Retrieve a lesson from the database using his id
        Parameters:
        id - : the lesson's id
        Returns:
        the retrieved lesson; null if there is no lesson with this id

      • interferes

        public boolean interferes(Group group,
                          Course course,
                          Lesson lesson,
                          int idLesson)
        Check if there the teacher and group's availability for this course hours
        Parameters:
        group - the group whose availability is checked
        course - the course's whose teacher's availability is checked
        lesson - the lesson we want to check availability for
        idLesson - the lesson's id
        Returns:
        true if there is any lesson interfering false if there is no lesson interfering
